title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the type of grant that the new welfare program created by the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Act uses.

For Task A2, the response must explain how it affects the relationship between the states and the federal government.

For Task B, the response must explain why states might prefer the type of funding provided by TANF rather than by previous programs.

For Task C1, the response must describe the constitutional principle that supports the interaction between the federal government and the state governments in this situation.

For Task C2, the response must explain how the constitutional principle relates to the scenario.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any five of the tasks set by the question.
